Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Reroute at Belmont/Racine
ShortDescription: 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Belmont, Racine, Diversey, Cannon Drive and Lakeshore West (Nature Museum) due to, street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Belmont, Racine, Diversey, Cannon Drive and Lakeshore West (Nature Museum) due to, street blockage.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #48 South Damen Temporary Reroute at 67th/Damen
ShortDescription: 48 South Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, 69th, Western, 63rd, and Damen due to, police activity at 67th/Damen.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#48 South Damen buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Damen, 69th, Western, 63rd, and Damen due to, police activity at 67th/Damen.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at Jackson. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at Jackson.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
